channel.title: Posts on Gaurav Arora
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Gaurav Arora

item.title: WIP:A short tour of libpst
item.description: The libpst is a library to extract text from microsoft properitery format .pst, which is used to storing emails, attachments. There isn't a good documentation for libpst. This is a simple tour writing a c++ program from scratch to extract an email and it's attachment from .pst file using libpst.

item.title: Linear to Quadratic and back
item.description: Can a single for loop be running with quadratic time complexity?

item.title: gdb Demystified
item.description: gdb is one of the useful commands to debug what's going wrong with your program.
